entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.8°C

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers except wet flurries over higher terrain. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
